Deprecated Interfaces
net.jxta.peergroup.Configurator
          This interface has been replaced with the NetworkConfigurator. 
net.jxta.document.DocumentByteArrayIO
           
net.jxta.resolver.GenericResolver
          This interface has been subsumed into the ResolverService. 
net.jxta.impl.peergroup.PlatformConfigurator
          This interface has been replaced with the NetworkConfigurator. 
net.jxta.document.TextDocumentCharArrayIO
           
net.jxta.document.TextDocumentCharBufferIO
           
net.jxta.document.TextDocumentCharSequenceIO
           
 

Deprecated Classes
net.jxta.impl.util.ACLSeedingManager
          Usage of ACL to check seeds has become functionally questionable now that 'use seed only' booleans are available to do the job too. Problem is: who is the authority on valid seeds? 
net.jxta.impl.util.AdvCooker
           
net.jxta.util.AwtUtils
           
net.jxta.impl.protocol.CertificateSigningRequest
          The types exported from this implementation are subject to change. 

   <xs:element name="jxta:csr" type="CertificateSigningRequest"/>

   <xs:complexType name="csr">
     <xs:all>
     </xs:all>
   </xs:complexType>
 
net.jxta.codat.Codat
           
net.jxta.codat.CodatID
           
net.jxta.impl.peergroup.ConfigDialog
           
net.jxta.impl.discovery.DiscoveryServiceInterface
           
net.jxta.impl.util.DynamicEnumeration
           
net.jxta.util.MarkProhibitedFilterStream
           
net.jxta.impl.xindice.core.filer.MemFiler
           
net.jxta.codat.Metadata
           
net.jxta.impl.util.ModuleManager
           
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory
          This factory has been deprecated in favour of WorldPeerGroupFactory and NetPeerGroupFactory. See the deprecations for the individual methods for the specific replacements/alternatives provided by the new factory classes. 
net.jxta.impl.peer.PeerInfoServiceInterface
           
net.jxta.impl.rendezvous.rpv.PeerviewSeedingManager
          Behavior of this seed manager is very questionable and not strong enough from a booting perspective. It is only use by EDGE rdv objects in rare cases. This class will be removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.util.PipeUtilities
           
net.jxta.impl.proxy.ProxyService
           
net.jxta.impl.rendezvous.RendezVousServiceInterface
           
net.jxta.impl.proxy.Requestor
           
net.jxta.impl.resolver.ResolverServiceInterface
           
net.jxta.impl.peergroup.StdPeerGroupParamAdv
          This internal class will eventually be removed. It has several problems which make it difficult to support. (The most obvious that it provides poor abstraction and provides references to its' own internal data structures). This class is expected to be replaced by a public API class performing a similar function though such an alternative is not yet available. You are encouraged to copy this code into your own application or service if if you depend upon it. 
 

Deprecated Fields
net.jxta.impl.cm.CacheManager.DEFAULT_GC_MAX_INTERVAL
          use XIndiceAdvertisementCache.DEFAULT_GC_MAX_INTERVAL instead 
net.jxta.impl.peergroup.StdPeerGroup.MODULE_IMPL_STD_PROVIDER
          will be removed in 2.8 
net.jxta.impl.peergroup.StdPeerGroup.MODULE_IMPL_STD_URI
          will be removed in 2.8 
net.jxta.platform.NetworkConfigurator.PROXY_NODE

net.jxta.platform.NetworkConfigurator.proxyConfig
           
net.jxta.meter.MonitorResources.proxyServiceMonitorClassID
           
net.jxta.platform.NetworkConfigurator.RDV_RELAY_PROXY_NODE
           
net.jxta.impl.peergroup.StdPeerGroup.STD_COMPAT
          will be removed in 2.8 
 

Deprecated Methods
net.jxta.rendezvous.RendezVousService.addPropagateListener(String, String, EndpointListener)
          This method just calls EndpointService.addIncomingMessageListener(net.jxta.endpoint.EndpointListener, java.lang.String, java.lang.String). It's better to just register your listener with the Endpoint. This call may be eventually removed. 
net.jxta.rendezvous.RendezVousService.challengeRendezVous(ID, long)
          Since 2.6, this method is deprecated, since connection to RDVs is handled by core code itself. This method will be removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.rendezvous.RendezVousService.connectToRendezVous(EndpointAddress)
          Directly connecting to rendezvous peers is not recommended. Seed rendezvous should be specified using the RdvConfigAdv mechanisms. This method will be removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.rendezvous.RendezVousService.connectToRendezVous(PeerAdvertisement)
          Directly connecting to rendezvous peers is not recommended. Seed rendezvous should be specified using the RdvConfigAdv mechanisms. This method will be removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.platform.NetworkConfigurator.createProxyAdv()
           
net.jxta.impl.cm.CacheManager.createTmpName(StructuredTextDocument)
          use XIndiceAdvertisementCache.createTmpName(net.jxta.document.StructuredTextDocument) directly instead. 
net.jxta.endpoint.EndpointService.demux(Message)
          Please convert your code to use processIncomingMessage(Message msg). This method will be removed from the code in a future release. 
net.jxta.rendezvous.RendezVousService.disconnectFromRendezVous(ID)
          This method will be removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.impl.protocol.RelayConfigAdv.getAclUri()
          ACL seed lists are in functional conflict with 'UseOnlyRelaySeedsStatus'. They will be deprecated and removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.impl.protocol.RdvConfigAdv.getAclUri()
          ACL seed lists are in functional conflict with 'UseOnlyRendezvousSeedsStatus'. They will be deprecated and removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.impl.rendezvous.PeerConnection.getCachedMessenger()
          Preferred style is to pass the connection object around and use the sendMessage method rather than getting the messenger. 
net.jxta.endpoint.EndpointService.getCanonicalMessenger(EndpointAddress, Object)
           
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.getConfiguratorClass()
          Consider converting to use NetPeerGroupFactory. 
net.jxta.rendezvous.RendezVousService.getConnectedPeerIDs()
          This method is not helpful at all functionally sepaking, since it does not help providing the list of EDGE peers connected to this peer if this peer is a RENDEZVOUS.

It will be removed after 2.6. Use getLocalRendezVousView() and getLocalEdgeView() instead. 
net.jxta.rendezvous.RendezVousService.getConnectedPeers()
          This method is not helpful at all functionally sepaking, since it does not help providing the list of EDGE peers connected to this peer if this peer is a RENDEZVOUS.

It will be removed after 2.6. Use getLocalRendezVousView() and getLocalEdgeView() instead. 
net.jxta.rendezvous.RendezVousService.getConnectedRendezVous()
          This method does not work properly. It relies on the getConnectedPeerIDs() method which returns the list of EDGE peers connected to this peer if this peer acts as a RENDEZVOUS.

Use getLocalRendezVousView() instead. 
net.jxta.impl.peergroup.CompatibilityUtils.getDefaultPackageURI()
          will be removed in 2.8 
net.jxta.impl.peergroup.CompatibilityUtils.getDefaultProvider()
          will be removed in 2.8 
net.jxta.endpoint.EndpointService.getDirectMessenger(EndpointAddress, Object, boolean)
           
net.jxta.util.JxtaBiDiPipe.getDirectMessenger(PeerGroup, PipeAdvertisement, PeerAdvertisement)
           
net.jxta.rendezvous.RendezVousService.getDisconnectedRendezVous()
          Due to design changes this no longer returns accurate nor complete results. It will eventually be removed. 
net.jxta.impl.cm.CacheManager.getIndexQuery(String)
          use XIndiceAdvertisementCache.getIndexQuery(java.lang.String) directly instead. 
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.EndpointServiceImpl.getInterface()
           
net.jxta.impl.peergroup.GenericPeerGroup.getInterface()
           
net.jxta.impl.rendezvous.RendezVousServiceImpl.getInterface()
           
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroup.getInterface()
          Since 2.6. The interface mechanisms is being removed from core code. Users are ultimately responsible for using service methods appropriately. The corresponding issue should be solved via OSGi (for example). 
net.jxta.service.Service.getInterface()
          Since 2.6. Users are responsible for using services and their methods appropriately. Ultimately, this issue may/will be solved via OSGi. 
net.jxta.impl.peergroup.GenericPeerGroup.getJxtaLoader()
          this statically scoped JxtaLoader instance should be phased out of use in favor of the group-scoped JxtaLoaders available via the getLoader() method. 
net.jxta.rendezvous.RendezVousService.getLocalWalkView()
          Due to design changes, the list of peers may be empty in configurations which previously returned a non-empty result. This method will be removed after release 2.6. 
net.jxta.endpoint.EndpointService.getMessenger(MessengerEventListener, EndpointAddress, Object)
          This method is being phased out. Prefer one of the other non-blocking variants. If a listener style paradigm is required, use ListenerAdaptor which emulates this functionality. 
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.EndpointServiceImpl.getMessenger(MessengerEventListener, EndpointAddress, Object)
          legacy method. 
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.router.RouteControl.getMessengerFor(EndpointAddress, Object)
          Use getMessengerFor(EndpointAddress destination) instead. This method will be removed in a future release. Hints should be processed via the addRoute() method. 
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.router.RouteControl.getMyLocalRoute()
          Use getLocalPeerRoute() instead. This methods will be removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.impl.rendezvous.RendezVousServiceInterface.getPeerView()
          This is private for debugging and diagnostics only. 
net.jxta.impl.membership.pse.PSECredential.getPrivateKey()
          Use <@link #getSigner(String)> or <@link #getSignatureVerifier(String)> instead. 
net.jxta.impl.protocol.RdvConfigAdv.getProbeRelays()
          This method is not exposed in the NetworkConfigurator. It should not be used elsewhere and will probably be removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.impl.protocol.HTTPAdv.getProxy()
          This has been deprecated. Set your proxy directly with the JVM 
net.jxta.platform.NetworkConfigurator.getRdvACLURI()
          ACL seed lists are in functional conflict with 'UseOnlyRendezvousSeedsStatus'. They will be deprecated and removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.platform.NetworkConfigurator.getRelayACLURI()
          ACL seed lists are in functional conflict with 'UseOnlyRelaySeedsStatus'. They will be deprecated and removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.impl.rendezvous.RendezVousServiceInterface.getRendezvousProvider()
          This is private for debugging and diagnostics only. 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.getStoreHome()
          Consider converting to use NetPeerGroupFactory and/or WorldPeerGroupFactory. 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroup.getWeakInterface()
          Since 2.6. The interface mechanisms is being removed from core code. Users are ultimately responsible for using service methods appropriately. The corresponding issue should be solved via OSGi (for example). 
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.router.RouteControl.isConnected(PeerID, RouteAdvertisement)
          Use isConnected(PeerID pid) only. This method will be removed in a future release. Hints should be processed via the addRoute() method. 
net.jxta.impl.protocol.HTTPAdv.isProxyEnabled()
          This has been deprecated. Set your proxy directly with the JVM 
net.jxta.peergroup.Configurator.load()
          Loading of existing configuration is best accomplished by use of specific constructors of the implementing configurator. This method complicates the state management of configuration parameters and may have unpredictable results depending upon the constructor and configuration set methods used prior to it's execution. 
net.jxta.impl.peergroup.NullConfigurator.load(URI)
          Loading of existing configuration is best accomplished by use of specific constructors of the implementing configurator. This method complicates the state management of configuration parameters and may have unpredictable results depending upon the constructor and configuration set methods used prior to it's execution. 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.newNetPeerGroup()
          Consider converting to use NetPeerGroupFactory.NetPeerGroupFactory() or preferably one of the other NetPeerGroupFactory constructors. 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.newNetPeerGroup(PeerGroup)
          Consider converting to use NetPeerGroupFactory.NetPeerGroupFactory(PeerGroup,ID,String,XMLElement). 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.newPeerGroup()
          This method was previously unused and has been removed with no alternatives. (it wasn't useful) 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.newPlatform()
          Consider converting to use WorldPeerGroupFactory.WorldPeerGroupFactory(). 
net.jxta.platform.NetworkConfigurator.newProxyConfiguration(URI)
           
net.jxta.platform.NetworkConfigurator.newRdvRelayProxyConfiguration(URI)
           
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.netty.NettyTransportClient.ping(EndpointAddress)
           
net.jxta.rendezvous.RendezVousService.removePropagateListener(String, String, EndpointListener)
          This method just calls EndpointService.removeIncomingMessageListener(java.lang.String, java.lang.String). It's better to just deregister your listener with the Endpoint. This call may be eventually removed. 
net.jxta.impl.protocol.RelayConfigAdv.setAclUri(URI)
          ACL seed lists are in functional conflict with 'UseOnlyRelaySeedsStatus'. They will be deprecated and removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.impl.protocol.RdvConfigAdv.setAclUri(URI)
          ACL seed lists are in functional conflict with 'UseOnlyRendezvousSeedsStatus'. They will be deprecated and removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.peergroup.Configurator.setConfigParams(ConfigParams)
          Configuration parameters should be set individually via whatever interfaces implementing configurator provides. This method over-writes all configuration settings in an unpredictable way. 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.setConfiguratorClass(Class)
          Consider converting to use NetPeerGroupFactory and/or WorldPeerGroupFactory. 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.setNetPGDesc(String)
          Consider converting to use NetPeerGroupFactory.NetPeerGroupFactory(ConfigParams,URI,ID,String,XMLElement) or NetPeerGroupFactory.NetPeerGroupFactory(PeerGroup,ID,String,XMLElement). 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.setNetPGID(PeerGroupID)
          Consider converting to use NetPeerGroupFactory.NetPeerGroupFactory(ConfigParams,URI,ID,String,XMLElement) or NetPeerGroupFactory.NetPeerGroupFactory(PeerGroup,ID,String,XMLElement). 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.setNetPGName(String)
          Consider converting to use NetPeerGroupFactory.NetPeerGroupFactory(ConfigParams,URI,ID,String,XMLElement) or NetPeerGroupFactory.NetPeerGroupFactory(PeerGroup,ID,String,XMLElement). 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.setPlatformClass(Class)
          Consider converting to use WorldPeerGroupFactory.WorldPeerGroupFactory(Class,ConfigParams,URI). 
net.jxta.impl.protocol.RdvConfigAdv.setProbeRelays(boolean)
          This method is not exposed in the NetworkConfigurator. It should not be used elsewhere and will probably be removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.impl.protocol.HTTPAdv.setProxy(String)
          This has been deprecated. Set your proxy directly with the JVM 
net.jxta.impl.protocol.HTTPAdv.setProxyEnabled(boolean)
          This has been deprecated. Set your proxy directly with the JVM 
net.jxta.platform.NetworkConfigurator.setRdvACLURI(URI)
          ACL seed lists are in functional conflict with 'UseOnlyRendezvousSeedsStatus'. They will be deprecated and removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.platform.NetworkConfigurator.setRelayACLURI(URI)
          ACL seed lists are in functional conflict with 'UseOnlyRelaySeedsStatus'. They will be deprecated and removed in a future release. 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.setStdPeerGroupClass(Class)
          This method previously had no effect and has been removed with no alternatives. 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroupFactory.setStoreHome(URI)
          Consider converting to use NetPeerGroupFactory and/or WorldPeerGroupFactory. 
net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroup.unref()
          Since 2.6. The interface mechanisms is being removed from core code. Users are ultimately responsible for using service methods appropriately. The corresponding issue should be solved via OSGi (for example). 
 

Deprecated Constructors
net.jxta.peergroup.NetPeerGroupFactory(ConfigParams, URI, ID, String, XMLElement)
          With the addition of support for PeerGroupConfigAdv this constructor is being deprecated as the precedence of settings is ambiguous. 
net.jxta.peergroup.NetPeerGroupFactory(PeerGroup, ID, String, XMLElement)
          With the addition of support for PeerGroupConfigAdv this constructor is being deprecated as the precedence of settings is ambiguous. 
 

Deprecated Enum Constants
net.jxta.platform.NetworkManager.ConfigMode.PROXY
